Investor_11_pre_1.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Investor_11_pre_1.content: Throughout the investment process, I demonstrated reliable behavior characterized by my commitment to mutual trust and collaboration. I approached the agreement with openness and adhered to the proposed allocation plan, showcasing my reliability and ethical investment practices. This solidifies my reputation as a supportive and ethical investor.

Trustee_11_pre_3.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11_pre_3.content: My recent performance as a trustee has solidified my reputation as a diligent and proactive individual. Successfully managing the investment where the investor received 70% of the profits, while I retained 30%, demonstrates my commitment to clear communication, reliability, and adherence to commitments. This positive outcome not only enhances my standing but also fosters trust for future transactions.
